job.title: Remote Senior PHP Web Developer - LAMP, Angular, MySQL, Apache
job.description: If you are a Remote Senior PHP Web Developer with experience, please read on!  We are a well-established mortgage lender and marketing company working with the top lenders across the country!  What You Will Be Doing  Opportunities range from creating new features in an existing system, to helping create new services from scratch on the latest technologies.  You will join a small and stable team of developers, make concrete and highly-visible contributions to the business, and develop expertise in optimizing web experiences on a high-traffic site.  The ideal candidate is confident in using their judgement to fill in gaps and make suggestions, willing to take ideas from others and run with them, and interested in developing their skills as a web developer.  What You Need for this Position What's In It for You So, if you are a Remote Senior PHP Web Developer with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Dominik.Sobaszek@CyberCoders.com Dominik Sobaszek - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
